name: A. Finding Sasuke
statement:
Naruto has sneaked into the Orochimaru’s lair and is now looking for
Sasuke. There are T rooms there. Every room has a door into it, each
door can be described by the number n of seals on it and their integer
energies a_1, a_2, ..., a_n. All energies a_i are and do not exceed 100
by absolute value. Also, .In order to open a door, Naruto must find such
n seals with integer energies b_1, b_2, ..., b_n that the following
equality holds: a_{1}
cdot b_{1} + a_{2}
cdot b_{2} + ... + a_{n}
cdot b_{n} = 0. All b_i must as well as a_i are, and also by absolute
value. Please find required seals for every room there.
